storyInfo: The members of Team Rainbow see their share of drama as they get to know Dossoles. Miłosz quietly shows up before the Capitán who planned the failed kidnapping.

attributes.content: Miss Ela. Are your friends not with you?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Your guards are very interested in Fuze and wouldn't stop asking questions. I left him there since you said you wanted to get them trained up.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: You said there were four of you.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Going by what we agreed on, two of us will protect you while the others continue our search here. They'll be on hand if we need them.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: You're not going out in public today anyway.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Just curious. In fact, it's easier on me with fewer people around.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: I saw you have two top-secret meetings on your schedule.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I do? What meetings?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Bungee jumping? That's a meeting?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Of course. Miłosz wouldn't let me do this, but he's not here today. Why not seize the opportunity?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: As your bodyguard... I advise you to rethink this.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: As your employer, I advise you to advise less.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Is my safety harness ready?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Yes, sir. You're good to jump anytime.
attributes.name: Staff

attributes.content: See you later.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Yahooo—!
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: What an asshole.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Nothing to worry about. Our equipment is first-rate. There's no danger at all.
attributes.name: Staff

attributes.content: You wouldn't have had him sign that waiver if there was no danger.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Would you like to come back and remove your safety harness, then?
attributes.name: Staff

attributes.content: On the other hand, my boss did pay for it.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Ela backs up to the edge and feels nothing but air on her heels, a tingling feeling that goes straight up her spine along the harness.
She smiles at the worker and falls backwards, allowing the feeling of weightlessness to seize her heart.
She waits for the rope to become fully stretched, then bounce back, pulling her back up.
Then she hears the sound of a splash in the roaring wind.
Oh no, that Vulpo unlocked his own harness?!
attributes.name: Staff

attributes.content: Gówno!
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Don't get sunburned when you enjoy the beach! Buy Sombrero Dude sunscreen now and get a free set of tail care oil...
attributes.name: Ad

attributes.content: What is that?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: That girl with cat ears was handing them out. I took one.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: It's true that UV rays are strong around here.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Not that, this.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Polishing stone for horns? What are they babbl—
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Who would have thought there would be such a wonderful vacation spot in war-torn Bolívar? I was dreading this business trip at first.
attributes.name: Excited Leithanian Tourist

attributes.content: It's been great, except the salt water makes your horns rough. I need to polish mine when we get back to the hotel.
attributes.name: Happy Leithanian Tourist

attributes.content: And conditioner tailored to Vulpo, Lupo and Feline.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Ten-liter set?! I mean, I know they have ears and tails and all...
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: This batch is a good one. Let's talk details on the beach tomorrow.
attributes.name: Sneaky Siracusan Tourist.

attributes.content: They'd better be worth the price.
attributes.name: Suspicious Siracusan Tourist

attributes.content: Okay, they need it.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Nothing could surprise me now.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: (Frowns disapprovingly)
attributes.name: Sankta Passerby

attributes.content: (Goes around scornfully)
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Sacré dieu...
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Let's welcome our guest today, Mr. Reynell Kowalski, the new star of Dossoles's art scene!
attributes.name: Host

attributes.content: Thank you, Dossoles TV, for giving me the chance to be scorned by thousands sitting in front of their television screens, and a way for them to let off some steam.
attributes.name: Reynell's Voice

attributes.content: Hey, isn't that the owner of Galería Krysztauowa?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I didn't expect to hear his voice on the street.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: I wonder if Ela and Fuze are getting along with him. I have a hunch he's one to get on your nerves.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: If you're not playing, get lost! You're scaring away customers with that shabby outfit.
attributes.name: Casino Bouncer

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I'm just advertising our community festival. I'm not bothering your guests.
attributes.name: Street Artist

attributes.content: You'd better not be.
attributes.name: Casino Bouncer

attributes.content: Hey, folks! Wanna check out our festival? Take a flyer! It's a real special event in the street art community!
attributes.name: Street Artist

attributes.content: Thanks, but I don't think we'll have the time...
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: You're not going to that glass house opening, are you? Don't let that guy fool you with his fancy talk! He doesn't know anything about art!
attributes.name: Street Artist

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Come on, take a flyer.
attributes.name: Street Artist

attributes.content: What does it say?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Hmm, I would be interested in checking it out, if they manage to pull it off.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: ...This ceremony will stimulate Dossoles's artistic and cultural fields.
attributes.name: Reynell's Voice

attributes.content: My staff and I have prepared extensive plans for acquisitions, business development, sector growth...
attributes.name: Reynell's Voice

attributes.content: The opening of Galería Krysztauowa will be a turning point in Dossoles's economic history.
attributes.name: Reynell's Voice

attributes.content: Now I'm more interested in what's on the flyer.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: *Cough* Are you out of your mind, you son of a vixen?!
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Wake up, you bastard!
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Stop playing dead! I can feel your pulse!
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: *Cough* Haha... *cough*
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Just a moment of capriciousness. Releasing the shackles that bind me at the closest point to the surface, and falling freely into the water...
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Isn't that so much more fun than just bouncing up and down on a rope?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: ...I'm sorry, Mr. Reynell, but I don't think I can continue to serve as your bodyguard. Thank you for giving us a place to stay. My squad and I will move out tomorrow.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Come on, I've fallen into water from even greater heights. See, I'm completely fine, am I not? No need to get angry.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: I can't protect a man who plays jokes with his life.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: You're mistaken, Miss Ela. I have a goal that I've been working toward for many years. Until it's complete, no one values his life more than I do.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Remember to wipe yourself dry. I can tell your constitution is not as strong as 'ours.'
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Don't you know? Once you step through this door, it's not up to you whether you get to step back through it again.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: I come in good faith, Capitán Mateo.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Good faith? After the reception my men got from your boss?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Why can't you and Reynell stop bickering with one another?
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Interesting question. Is he going to hand over the plot of land where that street art community is squatting?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Get in my way, and you get in the way of Bolívar's Coalition government.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: A Kazimierzian with nothing but money thinks he can negotiate with a government representative just because he hired a few mercenaries?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Reynell doesn't want to fight you over that piece of land. If we can reach an agreement, he is happy to cede control of the land to you... or to the Coalition government. It makes no difference.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: And you speak for him?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: I do.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: We could have been talking about this under more amicable circumstances, if not for that ill-conceived kidnapping attempt.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: You blame me for that?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: It was an unfortunate misunderstanding.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: No need to make excuses for me. I don't care. Just tell me, what does Reynell want?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: One doesn't do business in Bolívar for long without the support of a powerful patron... someone like you.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: I spent most of my years in the army, not the classroom. Get to the point.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Well... that neighborhood is not so much a home for artists as a lawless place where gangs roam unchecked.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: We had plans for its development, but the residents were utterly vicious. Even worse, there are Infected living among them.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Hmph. You thought money could solve all your problems in Dossoles.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Yes. Only those who are can solve problems get to enjoy the ultimate fruit.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: I don't know your style or skills, so I think the quickest way would be a simulated engagement.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Two teams, four in each team, best of three.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Attacking team tries to locate the hostage and rescue him, defending team tries to stop the attackers from rescuing the hostage.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Any questions?
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Who's the hostage?
attributes.name: Talkative Guard

attributes.content: For the sake of fairness, me.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: I'm in through the window!
attributes.name: Guard Attacker A

attributes.content: Room's empty! Moving on to the next one.
attributes.name: Guard Attacker A

attributes.content: Hey, watch where you're going!
attributes.name: Guard Attacker B

attributes.content: You watch where you're going!
attributes.name: Guard Attacker A

attributes.content: Quiet! I've already searched the direction you're going in. There's nobody there. Didn't you hear it on the radio?
attributes.name: Guard Attacker B

attributes.content: Radio? Oh, I dropped my earpiece out the window. I was looking for you to get a new one.
attributes.name: Guard Attacker A

attributes.content: Two enemies down. I could hear them from a mile away.
attributes.name: Guard Defender A

attributes.content: How about you crouch behind this board? Maybe show an inch or two of your head, so as to draw their attention.
attributes.name: Guard Defender B

attributes.content: The three of us will guard the only door and take them out as they enter.
attributes.name: Guard Defender C

attributes.content: ...You're not concerned that I could get hurt?
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Get hurt? Nah, we got them the moment they step inside.
attributes.name: Guard Defender D

attributes.content: Dammit! The Originium Arts! I can't see!
attributes.name: Guard Defender B

attributes.content: Th-They're coming in through the window! Stay back!
attributes.name: Guard Defender C

attributes.content: Hostage found. There were three idiots waiting by the door. Looks like they forgot there's more than one way in.
attributes.name: Guard Attacker C

attributes.content: The bright flash looks like it works well... hey, what's that guy doing?
attributes.name: Guard Attacker D

attributes.content: Get away from me! Dammit! Get away!
attributes.name: Guard Defender C

attributes.content: H-He's just shooting blindly! Where are my teammates? All down?!
attributes.name: Guard Attacker C

attributes.content: *Russian swearing*. Stop, stop!
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: You guys are a real eye-opener.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: You're back early. I thought you would be out enjoying places I don't let you go.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: There was an accident.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: You're hurt?
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: No, Miss Ela quit.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: ...This is the 32nd bodyguard who's had enough of you. I can't spend all day with you when I've got my own job to do.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: What about your negotiations with the Capitán?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: He took the bait.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Good. Now we'll see how our 'friends' in that community perform.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: He'll have his hands full.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: I've spent long enough dealing with those artists to know that if there's one thing they do well, it's causing trouble.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Miss Ela! Have you handed in your resignation papers yet?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: No one told me HR is closed today.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Ah, my staff have always been capricious. It's such a headache.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Before I go, you should know that the sculpture at the center of the special exhibit is a counterfeit.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: It's a tiny bit different from the other works by the same sculptor. You should look into it.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Maybe your dealer ripped you off. I guess that's a fact of life for a businessman like you.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Hahaha! I'm starting to regret letting you go, Miss Ela.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Oh yeah?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: You have a good eye. I was the one who made the counterfeit. I kind of liked it, so I just left it out.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: It's been there for a while. You're the first one to realize it's a fake.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Maybe others just don't dare point it out.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Since that doesn't bother you, my friends and I will be going now.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Just a moment, Miss Ela.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Would you keep working for me if I promised to behave?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: (Mumble) Well, that's something you don't see every day...
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: You're trying to persuade me to stay?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Don't you want to see the authentic piece? You must have spent a lot of time with that sculptor's work to notice such tiny details.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: I hope you can keep your promise.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: How far to Dossoles, Ernesto?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: We're almost there.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: You've been saying that for days!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Yes, we're almost there... once I deliver this batch of medicine, I'll take you to a sunny beach where you can lie down for a whole day.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Far away from any casinos or bars.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: I could live with bars. I understand that some people need to drink their troubles away... hey, how did you know I don't like casinos?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: It's my first time taking a partner operator home to Dossoles, so I asked Orchid about you before we left.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Then you know what happened when I left my homeland...
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: A brave act.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: And when I went back...
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: An honorable choice.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Well, it's not something I'm ashamed of... it's just a little more fit to be shared over a drink or two, not like this...
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Well, you can buy me a drink when we get to Dossoles. That's my price for hearing the story. Deal?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Deal.
attributes.name: Tequila
